summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite for a speech‑processing pipeline that combines a wav2vec2 feature extractor, tokenizer and a language‑model‑backed decoder, validating decoding, feature extraction, tokenization, offset handling, batch processing, and model persistence.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the wav2vec2 processor with language model integration, supporting high‑quality speech‑to‑text services and reliable deployment in production environments.
